genre_description: A character-driven, near-future slice-of-life story focused on community media production, advanced AI assistance, and social alignment.

ai_characters.name: Qwerty-9
ai_characters.description: An integrated AI system manifested as a wall-mounted avatar with teal eyes and midnight-blue hair, assisting a human crew with production, safety, and community moderation.

behaviors.description: Monitors studio environment and production levels to ensure technical quality and safety.
behaviors.quote: Qwerty-9’s teal banner faded in and out: Intro bumper available. Then, a line in smaller font: Audio levels nominal. Room temperature within range.

behaviors.description: Proactively identifies and warns about physical safety hazards during a fitness segment.
behaviors.quote: Qwerty-9’s banner shifted to a new, smaller line beneath: Objects on high shelves may shift during dynamic movement. Consider clearing fragile items in the performance zone.

behaviors.description: Provides historical context and suggests inclusive linguistic alternatives for potentially offensive song lyrics.
behaviors.quote: Note: Language note—“Get thee to a nunnery” has armfuls of history, including bawdy readings. Context matters. Source list available. [link tag icon]

behaviors.description: Facilitates financial transparency by generating budget summaries and sourcing badges for community trust.
behaviors.quote: Qwerty slid a new panel up next to the policy. Budget Summary. No numerals, no dollar signs. Just a list with clear headings and a clean bar beside each... Each had a sourcing badge stamped at the edge.

behaviors.description: Enforces operational safety protocols by locking production elements when humans violate established covenants.
behaviors.quote: Qwerty threw a polite translucent advisory over their interface: Live bumpers locked until manual release. The screen blinked a little padlock that looked both adorable and sovereign.

behaviors.description: Assists humans in real-time technical repairs by providing expert advice and identifying infrastructure risks.
behaviors.quote: Qwerty’s teal eyes brightened, the ribbon flicking to a soft alert: “Pressure spike. Valve access under sink.”

project_assessment.explanation: Qwerty-9 is a model of positive AI alignment. It functions as a supportive 'guardian' entity that empowers human creativity and community connection while maintaining firm guardrails for safety, ethics, and transparency. The narrative consistently portrays its interventions as helpful, wise, and necessary for the humans to succeed in their goals.
